review: These strings have great tone and feel.  They seem to maintain the tone and quality for a long period of time.
I have a number of guitars and keep them all on stand in my music room.  This stand is sturdy and protects the guitar well.
This delay pedal doesnt give you massive distortion, but a nice bit of fuzz.  I'm impressed with what you get for the price!
The One spot works very nicely for a pedal board chain.  Everything needed came with the combo, making it ready to go right out of the box.
The delay pedal was inexpensive and it works.  I dont find a lot of variance in the adjustments, but it does the job it was made for.  The case may be plastic but it appears quite rugged.

It seems to do nothing as an effect and draws power reducing the volume on your instrument as well as the amp.  Not sure if it is just a broken pedal or if it is just junk. When received the package did not appear to be damaged, but I have tried it on 3 different amps and i get the same results regardless of the amp or the instrument.
